display_help: Hitting an opponent with Kinetic Bolt, Forceful Blow, Disrupting Torrent, Kinetic Shockwave, Energetic Strike and Kinetic Lance will accumulate this resource, which empowers all your Kinetic Assault powers in a variety of ways.
display_target_help: Hitting an opponent with Kinetic Bolt, Forceful Blow, Disrupting Torrent, Kinetic Shockwave, Energetic Strike and Kinetic Lance will accumulate this resource, which empowers all your Kinetic Assault powers in a variety of ways.
